explain.it: Enter the tag id you want the uploads to appear in.

admin.uploadLimit: Upload limit (0 to 1000).  Admins are exempt from the limit.
admin.maxFile: Maximum file size (in MB, up to 10000).
admin.displayShorts: Enter the number of videos you want to display on the IndexPage.
admin.warningmessage: Exposing raw HTML can produce security vulnerabilities (if not your own). Remember also to use the correct width and height dimensions (to fit the block).
admin.getCode: Enable or disable custom HTML block in front-end view.
admin.backgroundColor: Set the background color of the custom html block here (hex code).

forum.modalinfo: (Please note that this will also be the discussion title):
forum.modalMenu: Choose a Discussion for the Upload:
forum.maxFileMessage: Please ensure that your upload is less than
forum.uploadlimit_maxfile1: You have may have exceeded the upload limit of
forum.uploadlimit_maxfile2: or exceeded the maximum file size limit of
forum.validFile: Please upload a valid video file!
